ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of shrimp soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed
des: "This is a fabulous recipe handed down from my dad.  Once you start eating this cheesy shrimp dip, you won't be able to stop."
ins: In a large saucepan, combine the cream of shrimp soup, cream of mushroom soup, canned shrimp and cheese. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until cheese is melted and well blended. Serve on cocktail rye slices.
